Now for the grand finale: The #JBFA or Outstanding Chef is a tie! @momofuku's David Chang and Paul Kahan from Blackbird.
The award for Outstanding Restaurant goes to Blue Hill #jbfa
The #JBFA for Outstanding Service is awarded to @DelPosto.
Maguy Le Coze of @LeBernardinNY wins the #jbfa for Outstanding Restaurateur @ericripert
The award for Best New Restaurant goes to State Bird Provisions #JBFA
Brooks Headley of @DelPosto takes the #jbfa award for Outstanding Pastry Chef
#JBFA winner for Outstanding Restaurant Design is Taavo Somer for Brooklyn's Isa.
#JBFA Lifetime Achievement winner and 93-years-young Cecilia Chiang: "This just goes to show you what happens when you live long enough!"

column4:
chef's chef Wylie Dufresne on his Lucci-like 10 noms (& finally a win).
331545667380068350,Mon May 06 23:07:01 +0000 2013,The #JBFA winner for Humanitarian of the Year is @Emeril Lagasse. Bam!
331544562973679600,Mon May 06 23:02:38 +0000 2013,The award for Best Chef: Northeast goes to Melissa Kelly of @primorockland #jbfa
331543976463192060,Mon May 06 23:00:18 +0000 2013,The winner of the #JBFA for Best Chef: New York City is Wylie Dufresne (wd~50).
331543713794900000,Mon May 06 22:59:15 +0000 2013,The Four Seasons' Julian Niccolini takes the stage with @Mariobatali in the chef's signature orange crocs #jbfa
331542753915858940,Mon May 06 22:55:26 +0000 2013,And the #jbfa award for Best Chef: Mid-Atlantic goes to Johnny Monis of @KomiDC
331541696699568100,Mon May 06 22:51:14 +0000 2013,The winner of the #JBFA for Outstanding Bar Program is the Aviary.
331541049635921900,Mon May 06 22:48:40 +0000 2013,Frasca Food and Wine wins the James Beard award for Outstanding Wine Program.
331539984446283800,Mon May 06 22:44:26 +0000 2013,And the #JBFA winner for Outstanding Wine, Beer or Spirits Professional is Merry Edwards (Merry Edwards Winery).
331537320903864300,Mon May 06 22:33:51 +0000 2013,@thefeednyc: The award for #jbfa Rising Star Chef of the Year goes to @dannybowien
